__e: And after what your brother did to his brother... that was self-defense.
He said it were an accident in a pub, it were self-defence, but now...
Hey,it's not what I had in mind for the evening, but like I said before-- self-defense.
I, Sebastian, take this woman to be my lawful wife... under the eyes of God, from this day forward.
To be my wedded wife... to have and to hold, from this day forward...
We had this guy, and what he did was when he was asked "Do you take this bride to be your lawful wedded wife?"
